name: Doki Doki A Slice Of Life
storyline: As the name suggests, it's a Slice Of Life, with regret coursing through Monica's veins, and the members of the club trapped in a void, Doki Doki: A Slice Of Life creates a new take on the DDLG story. What will our protagonist do when he has another chance to save those he loves?
summary: Doki Doki A Slice of Life is a mod for the game Doki Doki Literature Club that proposes a softer, more peaceful approach, focusing on everyday life and the interpersonal relationships between the characters in the original game. Unlike the main game, which contains elements of psychological horror and mystery, this mod aims to create a lighter and more optimistic experience, exploring simple moments such as walks, conversations and personal development, without the tensions of the original storyline.
